wiki.content:
"Ode to My Family" is a 1994 song recorded by the Irish band The Cranberries. It was the second single from their third studio album No Need to Argue. It was released in 1994.
 
 The song was a hit in most of the European countries where it was released, peaking at #4 in France, its highest position in the various charts. This ballad was nevertheless less successful than the previous Cranberries' single, "Zombie".
 
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Ode to My Family" is a 1994 song recorded by the Irish band The Cranberries. It was the second single from their third studio album No Need to Argue. It was released in 1994.  The song was a hit in most of the European countries where it was released, peaking at #4 in France, its highest position in the various charts. This ballad was nevertheless less successful than the previous Cranberries' single, "Zombie".
